title: 113_s1787
content: Medicaid Managed Care Responsibility and Equity Act - Amends titles XIX (Medicaid) and XXI (CHIP) of the Social Security Act (SSA) with respect to managed care requirements. Requires a minimum medical loss ratio of at least 85 for Medicaid and CHIP managed care plans under contracts between a state and a managed medical care entity , but a minimum ratio of only 80 for an entity in which at least 10 of the enrollees are optional targeted low-income children. Prescribes administrative penalties for failure to maintain such ratios. Applies the same minimum medical loss ratios to a state child health (CHIP) plan, except for a medical loss ratio of at least 80 for managed care organizations.
